title: For an existing user or retention user or any required compulsory open space or recreational open space or recreational ground, in any layout
clause_text: For an existing user or retention user or any required compulsory open space or recreational open space or recreational ground, in any layout. For any designation, allocation of the use or zone which is not subjected to acquisition. Existing nallah, river, natural stream, natural pond, tank, water bodies etc. Reservations which are not developable under the provisions of UDCPR.
section: Cases not eligible for Transferable Development Rights (TDR)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: For an existing user or retention user or any required compulsory open space or recreational open space or recreational ground, in any layout.
